with self.assertRaises(IOError):
    self.manager.add_dir('./test')
testcase = './tests'
self.manager.add_dir(testcase)
files = os.listdir(testcase)
add_dir_result = map(lambda _file: FileItem(os.path.join(testcase, _file)),
    files)
self.assertEqual(self.manager.files_container, add_dir_result)
